enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Reserved for CSD Undergrads Only
title: SoC CSD 369-0-1 Special Topics in Communication Sciences and Disorders

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Overview of normal and disordered communication. Speech, language, cognitive development and hearing disorders across the age continuum according to etiology, clinical manifestations, and intervention. Anatomy and physiology of speech, language, and hearing. Psychosocial impact of communicative disorders. Settings for service delivery; ethical and legal considerations; and professional issues.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value: This class may not be taken for credit if you completed CSD 369 Special Topics: Introduction to SLP in Spring 2015. This class is not appropriate for students who have completed a considerable number of pre-SLP courses (e.g. CSD 392, 301, 305, 319, 332).

subject: CSD
